title: Notwithstanding anything contained in these regulations for Permanent Transit Camp (PTC) tenements car parking at the rate mentioned in Regulation 44 Table-21 shall be provided or one parking space per tenement for two-wheeler shall be provided
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained in these regulations for Permanent Transit Camp (PTC) tenements car parking at the rate mentioned in Regulation 44 Table-21 shall be provided or one parking space per tenement for two-wheeler shall be provided. The above parking spaces may be provided in any combination.
section: 33(11)Provisions relating to Permanent Transit Camp tenements for Slum Rehabilitation Scheme:
